attributes.action: accept the threats of resignation from RBS Directors and disallow any proposed obscene bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As British taxpayers and majority shareholders of RBS, we categorically object to the recent proposed obscene bonuses.  

These so called 'professionals' have been a major contributory factor to this financial crisis, through their greed and arrogance and therefore request immediate action to conclude this outragous and proposterous notion, as we need our government and banking sector to lead the world not self distruct.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
